dc_title_s: State Designated Trout Streams - PLS Sections: Minnesota
dc_description_s: This data layer shows which Public Land Survey (PLS) Sections contain designated trout streams according to MN Rules Chapter 6264.   See link  (http://www.revisor.leg.state.mn.us/arule/6264/0050.html ) for a listing of designated trout waters and restrictions.   Use as a backdrop for the MN Trout Stream Designation  layer. Note that if more than one stream is designated within a given PLS section, only one will be referenced in the KITTLE_NO and KITTNAME attributes for that section.
